scripts.clean: bash -c 'shopt -s globstar; rm -rf **/{pnpm-lock.yaml,yarn.lock,package-lock.json} **/{node_modules,.wrangler} .next dist out build .svelte-kit .cache public .parcel-cache .turbo'
scripts.db:migrate:local: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply auto-landlord-db --local
scripts.db:migrate:remote: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply auto-landlord-db --remote
scripts.db:reset:local: npx wrangler d1 execute auto-landlord-db --local --command 'DROP TABLE IF EXISTS users; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS properties; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS tenants; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS tickets; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS applications; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS plans; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS subscriptions; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS property_images; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS marketing_kits; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS notifications;' && pnpm db:migrate:local && pnpm db:seed:local
scripts.deploy:preview: npx opennextjs-cloudflare build && npx opennextjs-cloudflare preview
scripts.deploy:build: npx opennextjs-cloudflare build && npx opennextjs-cloudflare deploy
